title: mEnu joochi
sahitya:
mEnu jUci mOsa bOkavE manasA lOnijADa lIlAgu kAdA



anupallavi



 hInamaina mala mUtra raktamula kiravancu mAyAmaya maina cAna



caraNam



 kannulanEDi yampa kolacEta gucci canulanEDi girula shiramuninci 

panulu cEturaTa tyAgarAja nutuni bAga nIvu bhajana jEsukommi strIla
